response.original_title: 1526 Metros Sobre el Nivel del Mar
response.overview: In the afternoon Margarita goes to her sewing room to create and talk with her friends about the stories that accompany her. The boxer in yellow, blue and red confronts a ghost on the street. The retirees take a cart drinking red wine standing in the middle of the Oriental with the Beach. Mario speaks with concern about the education his children receive, which only trains them to leave the field and not to continue in it. The sound of the city reaches its climax with the sunset to give way to the new moon.
response.title: 1526 Metros Sobre el Nivel del Mar
